title: D.L. Hughley: How To Survive America
description: Michael Smerconish sat down with comedian D.L. Hughley with his then-new book "How To Survive America" on June 17th, 2021. The book, co-authored by Doug Moe, was published on June 15th, 2021
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (TC Scornavacchi, Michael Smerconish, D.L. Hughley)
